relationships.description: Fudge believes that Dore was acting on Voldemort's instructions.
Dumbledore knows about Voldemort's plan to restore his strength and has confirmed its success.
Fudge accuses Dore of being a 'raving lunatic' who was acting on Voldemort's instructions.
